Game.View

Class PhaseView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.View.PhaseView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PhaseView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class represent the Phase View for the Main game.
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Jay, ndkcha, r-naik
